name: Hanoi Towers
description:
A Tower of Hanoi Game

Upload your score and let me know if you finished with 10 rings :)

High Score board is only working locally because it was only made with PlayerPrefs. I'd like to know what would be the best score though. I'll be thinking of implementing an online leader board maybe some other time.

Quickpatch: Close button for High Score board is back up again.
